languages.text: "Мне дали их в благодарность несчастные, что бросили свое бдение во дворце закона и решили вернуться к мирским делам".

traits.locale_text: "Мне дали их в благодарность несчастные, что бросили свое бдение во дворце закона и решили вернуться к мирским делам".
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "These were given to me in thanks by the poor souls who decided to abandon their vigil in this palace of the law and return to their worldly matters."
languages.original_text: "Мне дали их в благодарность несчастные, что бросили свое бдение во дворце закона и решили вернуться к мирским делам".

traits.locale_text: "These were given to me in thanks by the poor souls who decided to abandon their vigil in this palace of the law and return to their worldly matters."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "These were given to me in thanks by the poor souls who decided to abandon their vigil in this palace of the law and return to their worldly matters."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "These were given to me in thanks by the poor souls who decided to abandon their vigil in this palace of the law and return to their worldly matters."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "These were given to me in thanks by the poor souls who decided to abandon their vigil in this palace of the law and return to their worldly matters."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “那些可怜人决定不再继续留在这座法律的殿堂里，而是返回他们世俗的事务中。这是那些人送给我的谢礼。”
languages.original_text: "These were given to me in thanks by the poor souls who decided to abandon their vigil in this palace of the law and return to their worldly matters."

traits.locale_text: “那些可怜人决定不再继续留在这座法律的殿堂里，而是返回他们世俗的事务中。这是那些人送给我的谢礼。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Las pobres almas que han decidido abandonar su vigilia en este palacio de la ley y volver a sus asuntos terrenales me han ofrecido esto como agradecimiento».
languages.original_text: "These were given to me in thanks by the poor souls who decided to abandon their vigil in this palace of the law and return to their worldly matters."

traits.locale_text: «Las pobres almas que han decidido abandonar su vigilia en este palacio de la ley y volver a sus asuntos terrenales me han ofrecido esto como agradecimiento».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「哀れな魂から、礼として受け取った番号札だ。彼らは法務を司るこの宮廷で徹夜することをやめて、自分たちの仕事に戻ると決めてくれたのです」
languages.original_text: "These were given to me in thanks by the poor souls who decided to abandon their vigil in this palace of the law and return to their worldly matters."

traits.locale_text: 「哀れな魂から、礼として受け取った番号札だ。彼らは法務を司るこの宮廷で徹夜することをやめて、自分たちの仕事に戻ると決めてくれたのです」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Les pauvres âmes qui ont décidé de quitter ce palais de la loi afin de retourner vaquer à leurs occupations quotidiennes me les ont donnés en guise de remerciement. »
languages.original_text: "These were given to me in thanks by the poor souls who decided to abandon their vigil in this palace of the law and return to their worldly matters."

traits.locale_text: « Les pauvres âmes qui ont décidé de quitter ce palais de la loi afin de retourner vaquer à leurs occupations quotidiennes me les ont donnés en guise de remerciement. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Diese habe ich zum Dank von armen Seelen erhalten, die beschlossen haben, ihre Wacht in diesem Palast des Gesetzes zu beenden und zu ihren weltlichen Aufgaben zurückzukehren."
languages.original_text: "These were given to me in thanks by the poor souls who decided to abandon their vigil in this palace of the law and return to their worldly matters."

traits.locale_text: "Diese habe ich zum Dank von armen Seelen erhalten, die beschlossen haben, ihre Wacht in diesem Palast des Gesetzes zu beenden und zu ihren weltlichen Aufgaben zurückzukehren."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Bu fişleri, bu kanun sarayındaki nöbetlerini bırakıp dünyevi meselelerine dönmeye karar veren garibanlardan şükranlarıyla birlikte aldım."
languages.original_text: "These were given to me in thanks by the poor souls who decided to abandon their vigil in this palace of the law and return to their worldly matters."

traits.locale_text: "Bu fişleri, bu kanun sarayındaki nöbetlerini bırakıp dünyevi meselelerine dönmeye karar veren garibanlardan şükranlarıyla birlikte aldım."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
